activity-date.narrative: Only the year of activity is available

description.narrative: (Liberia) Awareness raising activities + psycosocial support to 200 ebola-affected families and diatribution of NFI + instalation of hygine facilities + establishment of 19 health committees to support affected populationa and participate in the awareness raising activities + equipment to 8 local health centers and hospitals (46.H.7-5-132) *(This data is from the old FTS API and is no longer updated.)
